name: AWS Transcribe
natural_language_description: 这是 AWS Transcribe 节点。主要用于: Sends data to AWS Transcribe

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: transcriptionJob
available_options: Transcription Job (值: transcriptionJob)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a transcription job
Delete (值: delete) - Delete a transcription job
Get (值: get) - Get a transcription job
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many transcription jobs
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

transcriptionJobName.name: transcriptionJobName
transcriptionJobName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Job Name | 作用: The name of the job

mediaFileUri.name: mediaFileUri
mediaFileUri.description: The S3 object location of the input media file
mediaFileUri.natural_language_description: 参数名: Media File URI | 作用: The S3 object location of the input media file

detectLanguage.name: detectLanguage
detectLanguage.description: Whether to set this field to true to enable automatic language identification
detectLanguage.natural_language_description: 参数名: Detect Language | 作用: Whether to set this field to true to enable automatic language identification | 默认值: False

languageCode.name: languageCode
languageCode.description: Language used in the input media file
languageCode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Language | 作用: Language used in the input media file | 默认值: en-US
available_options: American English (值: en-US)
British English (值: en-GB)
German (值: de-DE)
Indian English (值: en-IN)
Irish English (值: en-IE)
Russian (值: ru-RU)
Spanish (值: es-ES)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: channelIdentification (值: None) - Instructs Amazon Transcribe to process each audiochannel separately and then merge the transcription output of each channel into a single transcription. You can't set both Max Speaker Labels and Channel Identification in the same request. If you set both, your request returns a BadRequestException.
maxAlternatives (值: None) - The number of alternative transcriptions that the service should return

maxSpeakerLabels (值: None) - The maximum number of speakers to identify in the input audio. If there are more speakers in the audio than this number, multiple speakers are identified as a single speaker.
vocabularyName (值: None) - Name of vocabulary to use when processing the transcription job
vocabularyFilterName (值: None) - The name of the vocabulary filter to use when transcribing the audio. The filter that you specify must have the same language code as the transcription job.

vocabularyFilterMethod (值: None) - Set to mask to remove filtered text from the transcript and replace it with three asterisks ("***") as placeholder text.Set to remove to remove filtered text from the transcript without using placeholder text. Set to tag to mark the word in the transcription output that matches the vocabulary filter. When you set the filter method to tag, the words matching your vocabulary filter are not masked or removed.

returnTranscript.name: returnTranscript
returnTranscript.description: By default, the response only contains metadata about the transcript. Enable this option to retrieve the transcript instead.
returnTranscript.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return Transcript | 作用: By default, the response only contains metadata about the transcript. Enable this option to retrieve the transcript instead. | 默认值: True

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 20

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: jobNameContains (值: None) - Return only transcription jobs whose name contains the specified string
status (值: None) - Return only transcription jobs with the specified status
